snippet.title: Amnesia: A Machine For Pigs - Teaser
snippet.description:
Thank you to all HIB 5 (http://humblebundle.com) buyers! Initially we planned to do a teaser release if we reached a certain total payments goal... but before we had everything in place to do the event, any goal we had in mind was long passed!

Hope you'll enjoy the first peak at what AAMFP (http://aamfp.com) is shaping up to become. Teaser (and game of course...) made by the thechineseroom (thechineseroom.co.uk).

ABOUT AAMFP
Amnesia: A Machine for Pigs is an indirect sequel to the horror game Amnesia: The Dark Descent (http://amnesiagame.com).

As described in the joystiq article (http://www.joystiq.com/2012/02/22/amnesia-a-machine-for-pigs/):
"It's not a direct sequel, in terms of it doesn't follow on from the story of Amnesia. It doesn't involve the same characters," Dear Esther writer Dan Pinchbeck told me. Instead, Amnesia: A Machine for Pigs will be set in the same "alternate history and set in the same universe.

AAMFP is a collaborative effort between Frictional Games and thechineseroom. Coming early 2013 (later release date due to overwhelming response, we want to make sure to meet the expectations).
